data: {"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ここからは ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Flet","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":" の基礎について学んでいきます。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"まず、PythonのプログラムにこれからFletを使うことを明記しなければなりません。プログラムの先頭にこのように書きます。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"import flet","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"で「このプログラムではFletを使うよ」ということを示しており、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"as ft","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"で、「Fletを","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ft","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"という名前で使うよ」と示しています。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"つづいて、このようなコードを書くとFletでウィンドウを作ることができます。このウィンドウを生成することがGUI開発の第一歩です。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"#","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"は","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"コメントアウト","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"と呼ばれるもので、Pythonのプログラムでは","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"#","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"以降に書いたものは実行されずに無視されるのです。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プログラムに関する説明や注意を残したいときに便利です。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"これでコマンド","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"flet run プログラムファイル名","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を実行することで中身になにも表示されないウィンドウが立ち上がるはずです。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"定義したmain関数の中身に、GUIを構成するパーツとなる","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"「コントロール」","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"というもの（次回紹介）を配置していきます。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"また、Fletではこのウィンドウ内の領域を","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"「ページ」","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"と呼びます。","href":null}]}

{"icon":{"type":"emoji","emoji":"☝"},"color":"blue_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"今回紹介した","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"コード","href":"/posts/curriculums/1f2a501e-f337-8055-b70d-e6fcbb3bbb87/1f2a501e-f337-8115-9ab6-e102f005effc"},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"は、全てきちんと意味のあるプログラムではあるのですが、今それを完全に理解する必要はありません。今は、ウィンドウを生成できる魔法のコード、ぐらいの感覚で大丈夫です。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"現在配置している","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"pass","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"は「なにもしない（配置しない）」ということを示す文言です。","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"gray"},"plain_text":"たぶん使うのは最初で最後です。","href":null}]}
